Get CENO Browser

The safest way to install CENO Browser on your Android phone is through the Google Play Store:

Alternatively, you can install CENO via the Paskoocheh Marketplace, or download the APK directly via Github:

Direct Download

For advanced users or those unable to install CENO Browser via the above links, you can download the latest APK directly:

CENO Browser 1.0.2

You can verify the signature certificate matches the SHA256 fingerprint below:

A5:9D:20:C0:76:F6:17:0A:2C:13:D9:CE:96:CD:43:49
68:8F:90:78:98:DF:C3:C8:9B:0A:E6:EB:E9:F7:ED:CA


CENO Browser is a project by eQualit.ie – a Canadian company developing open and reusable systems with a focus on privacy, online security and freedom of association. Technology solutions and innovations are driven by our values that guide us to protect the rights and aspirations of everyone online.
